dkeep.logic

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, Guard, Hero, Key, MassiveClub, Ogre

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A level element. Entities can be humanoid characters (the hero, the guards and ogres) or level elements (the keys and the doors). Each entity has a sprite (represented by a char) and a set of coordinates.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
